mapper.select: SELECT * FROM synthesisknife sk WHERE sk.RFID IN (SELECT r.RfidContainerID FROM rfidcontainer r WHERE r.DelFlag = '0' AND r.RfidCode = #{rfidCode} ) AND sk.DelFlag = '0' AND sk.SynthesisCutterNumber = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE tooltransfer tt SET tt.DelFlag = '1' ,tt.UpdateTime=NOW() ,tt.UpdateUser =#{rfBean.updateUser} ,tt.Version = tt.Version + 1 WHERE tt.RfidContainerID IN ( SELECT rf.RfidContainerID FROM rfidcontainer rf WHERE rf.RfidCode = #{rfBean.rfidCode} )
mapper.select: select SynthesisParametersID synthesisParametersID,CreateType createType from synthesisparameters where SynthesisParametersCode = #{syn.synthesisParametersCode} and DelFlag = '0'
select PartsID partsID, ProcessID processID, EquipmentID equipmentID, AssemblyLineID assemblyLineID, AxleID axleID from oplink where SynthesisParametersID = #{oplink.synthesisParametersID}

SELECT sl.ToolCode toolCode,COUNT(1) toolCount,sl.SynthesisCutterNumber synthesisCutterNumber FROM synthesisparameters sp INNER JOIN synthesiscutterlocation sl ON sp.SynthesisParametersID = sl.SynthesisParametersID WHERE sl.SynthesisParametersID = #{synthesiscutterlocation.synthesisParametersID} AND sp.DelFlag = '0' AND sl.DelFlag = '0' GROUP BY ToolCode

update rfidcontainer set
RfidReCount = #{entity.rfidReCount},
LaserIdentificationCode = #{entity.laserIdentificationCode},

mapper.select: select SynthesisParametersNumber synthesisParametersNumber from synthesisknife where SynthesisParametersCode = #{entity.synthesisParametersCode} order by ABS(SynthesisParametersNumber) desc limit 1

SELECT ToolID toolID ,LibraryCodeID libraryCodeID ,ToolCode toolCode ,ToolName toolName ,ToolType toolType ,ToolPic toolPic ,ToolUnitnumber toolUnitnumber ,ToolSpecifications toolSpecifications ,ToolSupplier toolSupplier ,ToolCutNumber toolCutNumber ,ToolBrand toolBrand ,ToolGrinding toolGrinding ,ToolConsumetype toolConsumetype ,ToolSharpennum toolSharpennum ,ToolMax toolMax ,ToolMin toolMin ,ToolNumber toolNumber ,standard standard ,ToolSharpenCriterion toolSharpenCriterion ,ToolLength toolLength ,ToolSharpenLength toolSharpenLength ,ToolTurnover toolTurnover ,QuotaProcessingVolume quotaProcessingVolume ,Per10k per10k ,PurchasingCycle purchasingCycle ,DelFlag delFlag ,UpdateUser updateUser ,CreateUser createUser ,Version version ,UniquelyIdentify uniquelyIdentify ,BeiMin beiMin ,BeiMax beiMax from tool where ToolID = #{tool.toolID}

SELECT t.ToolID toolID, t.ToolCode toolCode, t.ToolConsumetype toolConsumetypeID, t.ToolGrinding toolGrinding, t.ToolType toolType, c.ComListText toolConsumetype, t2.toolCount FROM tool t LEFT JOIN comlist c on t.ToolConsumetype = c.ComListValue and c.ComListType = 'ToolConsumetype' and c.DelFlag = '0' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sl.ToolCode ToolCode,COUNT(1) toolCount FROM synthesisparameters sp INNER JOIN synthesiscutterlocation sl ON sp.SynthesisParametersID = sl.SynthesisParametersID WHERE sp.SynthesisParametersCode = #{spCode} AND sp.DelFlag = '0' AND sl.DelFlag = '0' GROUP BY ToolCode) t2 ON t.ToolCode = t2.ToolCode WHERE t.ToolCode IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ToolCode FROM synthesisparameters sp INNER JOIN synthesiscutterlocation sl ON sp.SynthesisParametersID = sl.SynthesisParametersID WHERE sp.SynthesisParametersCode = #{spCode} ) and t.DelFlag = '0' ORDER BY t.ToolCode

SELECT t.ToolID AS toolID, t.ToolCode AS toolCode, t.LibraryCodeID AS libraryCodeID, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM knifeinventory kn WHERE kn.ToolID = t.toolID AND kn.DelFlag='0') as knifelnventoryNumber, t.ToolConsumetype AS toolConsumetype FROM tool t WHERE t.ToolCode = #{vk.toolCode}

SELECT ( SELECT rf.RfidContainerID FROM rfidcontainer rf INNER JOIN knifeinventory kn1 ON rf.RfidContainerID = kn1.RfidContainerID WHERE kn1.DelFlag = 0 AND rf.DelFlag = 0 AND kn1.ToolID = t.ToolID LIMIT 1 ) AS RfidContainerID, t.ToolID AS ToolID, t.ToolCode AS ToolCode, t.LibraryCodeID AS LibraryCodeID, ( SELECT SUM(kn.KnifelnventoryNumber) FROM knifeinventory kn WHERE kn.ToolID = t.ToolID AND kn.DelFlag = '0' ) AS KnifelnventoryNumber, t.ToolConsumetype AS ToolConsumetype FROM tool t WHERE t.DelFlag = '0' AND t.ToolCode = #{v.toolCode} LIMIT 1
select SynthesisParametersCode synthesisParametersCode, rFID, ToolCode toolCode, ToolCount toolCount from tubedetailinfo where rFID = #{rfid} and LoadState = '0'

mapper.select: SELECT sl.ToolCode toolCode, COUNT(1) toolCount, sl.SynthesisCutterNumber synthesisCutterNumber FROM synthesisparameters sp INNER JOIN synthesiscutterlocation sl ON sp.SynthesisParametersID = sl.SynthesisParametersID WHERE sl.SynthesisParametersID = ( SELECT SynthesisParametersID FROM synthesisparameters WHERE SynthesisParametersCode = ( SELECT SynthesisParametersCode FROM synthesisknife WHERE rFID = #{rfidID} LIMIT 1 ) ) AND sp.DelFlag = '0' AND sl.DelFlag = '0' GROUP BY ToolCode
